mapper.select: select * from jado_user where userNum in (select userNum from jado_member where proNum=#{proNum} and agreed='Y')
mapper.delete: delete from jado_gantmember where gantNum=#{gantNum} and userNum=#{userNum}
mapper.update: update jado_gantmember set startdate=#{startDate},endDate=#{endDate},duration=#{duration} where gantNum=#{gantNum} and userNum=#{userNum}
mapper.select: select * from jado_gantchart where proNum=#{proNum} order by gantNum

select jado_gantmember.userNum, gantNum, to_char(startdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') startdate, to_char(enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd') enddate, name, duration, gantpercent from jado_gantmember, jado_user where gantNum=#{gantNum} and jado_gantmember.userNum=jado_user.userNum order by startdate
